CustomField.formula:
IF((TotEst__c / 9) = 0, "Not Estimated", IF((TotEst__c / 9) <= 5, "Very Small", IF(((TotEst__c / 9) > 5 && (TotEst__c / 9) <= 10), "Small", IF(((TotEst__c / 9) > 10 && (TotEst__c / 9) <= 15), "Medium", IF(((TotEst__c / 9) > 15 && (TotEst__c / 9) <= 20), "Large", IF(((TotEst__c / 9) > 20 && (TotEst__c / 9) <= 30), "X-Large", IF(((TotEst__c / 9) > 30 && (TotEst__c / 9) <= 40), "XX-Large", IF((TotEst__c / 9) > 40, "XXX-Large",
"ERROR"))))))))
CustomField.label: T-Shirt Size (Detailed)
